---


- According to the polls, the Incumbent LDF government is set to break the record by winning a second consecutive term.

- At the same time, the negligible difference in the vote share between LDF and UDF in the recent local body election gives hope for UDF.

- This election will reveal whether  BJP would rise as a formidable power in the state resulting in a tri-polar contest.
